description:
Forrest is a part-time student with a part-time job as a waiter.
He's 21 years old and has a girl friend but says she's more of a "friend" than anything else.
He says he's never done anything with another guy, but when asked about whether or not he'd thought about it, his (long) response was interesting.
Without a pause, he replied, "Uh, of course you always think about those little 'what if you're drunk someday' but I consider myself a straight guy but I have the utmost respect for people's orientations and all that so..."
I don't know about you, but I think we might be seeing that hot hairy hole of his get explored pretty darn soon!
title: Forrest
